thread.title: BRIEF-Global Blockchain Announces Strategic Investment Of $3 Mln Into Breaking Data Corp

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Global Blockchain Announces Strategic Investment Of $3 Mln Into Breaking Data Corp
text:
13 AM / Updated 24 minutes ago BRIEF-Global Blockchain Announces Strategic Investment Of $3 Mln Into Breaking Data Corp Reuters Staff 
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Global Blockchain Technologies Corp : 
* DGAP-NEWS: GLOBAL BLOCKCHAIN ANNOUNCES STRATEGIC INVESTMENT OF $3,000,000 INTO BREAKING DATA CORP. 
* ‍PURSUANT TO OFFERING, BREAKING DATA ISSUED 1 MILLION COMMON SHARES TO COMPANY AT A PRICE OF CDN$3.00 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ( Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com )
